subject: Re: qt on GNOME and gtk+ on KDE deuglyfication.
body:
On lun, 2007-04-23 at 16:06 -0300, Gustavo Franco wrote:
> * aptitude install pyqt-tools kde-style-klearlook qt3-qtconfig

With kde-style-klearlook you get kdelibs, wich is really a pita. Isn't
there a way to have qt themes *without* kde?
-- 
Yves-Alexis


--
